\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
% \usetikzlibrary{positioning} % for relative note placement (right = of)

\tikzset{%
  node distance=0cm   % 0 distance between nodes so that edges coincide
}

% Style of "tarjeta" node
\input{clasificacionTarjetas-multiplicacion-estiloTarjetas.tex}



\node[tarjeta] (tarjeta-1-1) {$1\times 6$};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-1-1] (tarjeta-1-2) {$1\times 7$};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-1-2] (tarjeta-1-3) {$1\times 8$};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-1-3] (tarjeta-1-4) {$1\times 9$};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-1-4] (tarjeta-1-5) {$1\times 10$};

\foreach \row in {2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10}{
  \pgfmathsetmacro{\rowPrev}{int(\row-1)}
  \node[tarjeta, below = of tarjeta-\rowPrev-1] (tarjeta-\row-1) {$\row\times 6$};
  \node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-\row-1] (tarjeta-\row-2) {$\row\times 7$};
  \node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-\row-2] (tarjeta-\row-3) {$\row\times 8$};
  \node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-\row-3] (tarjeta-\row-4) {$\row\times 9$};
  \node[tarjeta, right = of tarjeta-\row-4] (tarjeta-\row-5) {$\row\times 10$};
}

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
